languages.text: "Дальше? Вечность". {n}Маражай чуть касается вашего лица.{/n} "Много вечностей, что складываются из тех мгновений, которые мы переживаем, забывшись вместе в кровавом мареве. Каждое из них стоит столетий, когда твою одержимость делит равный тебе".

"Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."
languages.original_text: "Дальше? Вечность". {n}Маражай чуть касается вашего лица.{/n} "Много вечностей, что складываются из тех мгновений, которые мы переживаем, забывшись вместе в кровавом мареве. Каждое из них стоит столетий, когда твою одержимость делит равный тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

"Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

"Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

"Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

languages.text: “接下来？是永恒。”{n}玛拉斋轻抚着你的脸。{/n}“在血腥的迷雾中忘却自我，无数瞬间将在这一刻成为永恒。与情投意合的伴侣共赴极乐的每个瞬间，都将如跨越千年。”
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: “接下来？是永恒。”{n}玛拉斋轻抚着你的脸。{/n}“在血腥的迷雾中忘却自我，无数瞬间将在这一刻成为永恒。与情投意合的伴侣共赴极乐的每个瞬间，都将如跨越千年。”

languages.text: «¿Ahora? La eternidad». {n}Marazhai roza suavemente tu rostro.{/n} «Muchas eternidades han brotado de los instantes que experimentamos cuando nos abandonamos al frenesí de la sangre. Cada instante se prolonga durante siglos cuando compartes una obsesión con tu igual».
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ahora? La eternidad». {n}Marazhai roza suavemente tu rostro.{/n} «Muchas eternidades han brotado de los instantes que experimentamos cuando nos abandonamos al frenesí de la sangre. Cada instante se prolonga durante siglos cuando compartes una obsesión con tu igual».

languages.text: « Ce qui nous attend ? L'éternité. » {n}Marazhai effleure délicatement votre visage.{/n} « De nombreuses éternités se sont formées dans les moments où nous nous sommes laissés aller dans un brouillard sanglant. Chacun de ces instants peut durer des siècles quand une telle obsession est partagée avec un égal. »
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui nous attend ? L'éternité. » {n}Marazhai effleure délicatement votre visage.{/n} « De nombreuses éternités se sont formées dans les moments où nous nous sommes laissés aller dans un brouillard sanglant. Chacun de ces instants peut durer des siècles quand une telle obsession est partagée avec un égal. »

languages.text: "Nun? Die Ewigkeit setzt ein." {n}Marazhai berührt sanft dein Gesicht.{/n} "Es sind schon so viele Ewigkeiten im gemeinsam erlebten Blutrausch entstanden. Wenn man seine Besessenheit zusammen mit einem Gleichgesinnten auslebt, ist jeder dieser Augenblicke viele Jahrhunderte wert."
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: "Nun? Die Ewigkeit setzt ein." {n}Marazhai berührt sanft dein Gesicht.{/n} "Es sind schon so viele Ewigkeiten im gemeinsam erlebten Blutrausch entstanden." Wenn man seine Besessenheit zusammen mit einem Gleichgesinnten auslebt, ist jeder dieser Augenblicke viele Jahrhunderte wert."

languages.text: 「次？永遠だ」{n}マラズハイがあなたの顔に軽く触れる。{/n}「血みどろの靄の中で我を忘れ、経験するその瞬間よりあまたの永遠が形づくられる。それぞれの瞬間は、お前の執着が対等なるものへと共有される時に、何世紀もの価値をもたらすのだ」
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: 「次？永遠だ」{n}マラズハイがあなたの顔に軽く触れる。{/n}「血みどろの靄の中で我を忘れ、経験するその瞬間よりあまたの永遠が形づくられる。それぞれの瞬間は、お前の執着が対等なるものへと共有される時に、何世紀もの価値をもたらすのだ」

languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

languages.text: "Sırada ne mi var? Sonsuzluk." {n}Marazhai, yüzüne hafifçe dokunuyor.{/n} "Kana bulanmış bir pusta kendimizi birlikte kaybederken deneyimlediğimiz o anlardan nice sonsuzluk oluştu. Saplantını dengin olanla paylaştığın her bir an, asırlara bedeldir."
languages.original_text: "Next? Eternity." {n}Marazhai lightly touches your face.{/n} "Many eternities formed from the moments we experience as we forget ourselves together in a bloody haze. Each moment is worth centuries when your obsession is shared by your equal."

traits.locale_text: "Sırada ne mi var? Sonsuzluk." {n}Marazhai, yüzüne hafifçe dokunuyor.{/n} "Kana bulanmış bir pusta kendimizi birlikte kaybederken deneyimlediğimiz o anlardan nice sonsuzluk oluştu. Saplantını dengin olanla paylaştığın her bir an, asırlara bedeldir."
